sections.title: Instructions
sections.markdown:
- Set aside about 5 minutes in a quiet spot.
- Use short phrases; complete sentences are optional.
- If a prompt does not fit, skip it and move on.
- Rate based on the past 7 days.

sections.title: Client worksheet
sections.markdown:
### How to rate
Use 0 (not at all) to 4 (very much).

### Items
1. I felt connected to others.
2. I reached out for support when needed.
3. I felt understood by someone.

Total score: ______ (0-12)

sections.title: Clinician notes
sections.markdown:
- Draft-only, clinician review required.
- This is a self-rating tool, not a diagnosis.
- Scoring: sum items for a 0-12 range.
- Use trend over time rather than a single score.

scoring.rulesMarkdown: Sum the item scores. Track changes over time; this is not diagnostic.
